name: Mustang Survival Minimalist Belt Pack - Unisex
description: Buoyancy on demand. This inflatable belt PFD is compact and stays out of the way until you need it.Bladder sits on your front and secures with a buckle and webbing belt.Manually inflates by pulling an activation cord.Buoyancy: 18.9lbs when inflated.Harmonized 70 / Type III equivalent.Buckle extender sold separately.Re-Arm Kit J available (sold separately).
